author: Andrew John Berthold
comment: Great watch faces! "Next" is my favourite, but it reverts to a boring old analogue face when there is no event coming up soon. I love the typography and the way it looks in ambient mode, If you could make it so that instead of reverting to an analogue version, it just has digital time displayed using the same style as the regular text on this watch face, I'd gladly give it a 5 star rating!

author: Joe Morrison
comment: Brilliant watch faces. "Next" is my favorite. I have a busy schedule and I love being able to see what's coming up at a glance. I actually really like the simple, elegant face that displays when there's nothing imminent. The Ustwo designers really understood how to take advantage of Android Wear to create something that shows a view of time, in a beautiful, intuitive, glanceable way, and is also novel and couldn't have been done mechanically. Kudos.

author: Chris Fawcett
comment: Love these faces but 'versus' does not work, it fails to show yesterday's step count. Tried reinstalling, reconnecting to Fit, clearing cache. Nothing is working. Any ideas Ustwo??

author: James Huxley
comment: At a glance planning for keeping me on track for upcoming meetings. Then I switch to the weather face to plan my outdoor activities.
title: A beautiful design that is more than 'just clever'.

author: Alex Puterbaugh
comment: Creative, beautiful, unique, and useful.  These faces are a few years old, but thier distinctive look only matures as watch screens get sharper and more vibrant.  All of ustwo's work is beautiful to look at.

author: Crystal Vlog
comment: I cannot find the app in my mobile

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content: Are you running Android Wear 2.0 on your watch? If so, the process for installing watch faces has changed- you'll need to open the Play Store app on your watch, scroll down to ""Apps on your phone"" and install the watch face from there. Otherwise, you can search for and install our watch faces directly from the watch's Play Store app.

author: Barry Ashford
comment: Updated - 4th time installing it and it seems to have sorted itself. Accessed watch faces through the android wear app and they were all now present. Happy now. Definitely worth ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

author: Stuart Jarvis
comment: These designers are very good. The watch faces are modern and clean. Love your work!
title: Modern, simple, and stylish

author: Heather McCormack
comment: I really like these but I can't figure about how to link it to my Samsung gear S2. Is this compatible?

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi Heather,
Our watch faces only support devices running Android Wear at this time.

Otherwise, you can search for and install our watch faces directly from the watch's Play Store app.

If so, the process for installing watch faces has changed- you'll need to open the Play Store app on your watch, scroll down to ""Apps on your phone"" and install the watch face from there. author: Brian Hadfield
comment: All of your watch faces are fun, original, and brilliantly designed.
title: Awesome

comment: Oh, nd Next is my favorite.

comment: But it has a problem. The "next" watchface is not black (even when dimmed) so it consume more battery on led screens

reply.content:

title: Great

author: David Carli-Arnold
comment: Whenever I select the Next face, I instead get a full screen black and white analog clock, with the time until next appointment in the top left corner in small text.

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, David!

This is as design! If the next appointment is within the next 5 hours it will display in the purple color. If the event is after 5 hours but within the next 24 hours, it will display the way you are noticing it. Hope this helps!

Thank you for your time,
ustwo Wear Team

title: Next Watchface Doesn't Work

author: Aaron Woods
comment: Took a few hours but it finally made its way to my phone/watch.
title: It works

author: Dylan Drepaul
comment: The little stories in the changelog are awesome btw xD
title: Great watchfaces

author: abiali doctor
comment: the app not seen in myapp and its not able to open

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Abiali!

All of our watch faces are accessible through the Android Wear App under the "More Watch Faces" button at the top of the Android Wear App home screen. Please make sure your Android Wear app and Google Play Services is up to date. If this does not resolve the issue, please hit us up at wearissues@ustwo.com!

Best,
ustwo Wear Team

title: how i can opperate it

author: dan Bdan
comment: interesting designs but need more config
title: settings please..

author: Joshua Nahum
comment: I really like the simplicity of the "Next" watchface, but wish it had more customization (color, size). It doesn't utilize the full screen. And it doesn't provide a way to get to the agenda app for more info (either on watch or phone). Minor gripes, but very nice for what it does.

author: Chris Adams
comment: Never showed up in the wear app until I rebooted phone and watch. Customization really limited but the limited faces look pretty nice
title: A bit limited and confusing insta

author: Jeremiah Harmsen
comment: Runway weather is old / wrong.  Other faces show temperatures that are 30° different.

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Jeremiah!

We are aware of this issue and have been working to fix it. Stay tuned for updates!

Best,
ustwo Wear Team

comment: Permissions show up, but the watch face themselves are nowhere to be seen
title: Doesn't show up

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: The 2.4 update made the ambient mode text bold I'm Forecast, a welcome improvement.  These faces are very well designed and useful, but people like me that love options might find them lacking.  Also, no card previews in Ambient Mode.

comment: Will it rain later today? Love being able to see what's coming up with weather. Best clock there is!

author: Matthew Delgado
comment: Looks like great watch faces but will it ever work on the gear s2?

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Matthew!

We have no immediate plans to support Tizen OS, so, no, unfortunately, our watch faces will not work on the Gear S2.

Thank you for your time,
ustwo
